name: Waven
summary: Waven is a free to play MMORPG that takes players to the mystical World of Twelve, the setting for the popular games Wakfu and Dofus. The World of Twelve is slowly disappearing beneath rising waters, and much of the population has sought refuge in Dimensional Havens. You enter the role of one of these dimensional refugees, and from this humble beginning your adventure begins. Explore new lands and defend your home, seek out wealth and adventure, and learn about the world and yourself. Waven offers engaging gameplay, unusual animated graphics, an immersive storyline, and much more.
